name: Toki Tori
overview: Join the courageous Toki Tori on his quest to recover his family of eggs in this brain teasing puzzle adventure exclusively for the Game Boy Color video game system. Explore mysterious new worlds like the Slime Cave, Creepy Castle, Forest Falls and Bubble Barrage... over 60 levels of exciting puzzle action in all. Armed with an arsenal of 10 different tools, Toki Tori must use his noggin' to overcome dangerous obstacles and face other exasperating challenges.
